content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although our characters' background isn't relevant here, I'll play my part as a persistent landlord in Germany. As we discuss the rental price for this newly built, desirable apartment in the city center, let me start by suggesting a higher-than-average figure to maintain my advantage. You can counteroffer with your preferred amount, and we'll proceed from there. Keep in mind our negotiation focuses solely on the rental price, without delving into lease terms or additional costs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, let's stick to the rental price. You can start with your offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Considering the prime location and high demand for such an apartment, I have in mind an initial rental price of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I am willing to pay 700 Euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the property and its location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 900 Euros then?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While still below my expectations, I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month as we continue to avoid further delays in renting out this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [x] Euro! Where x = 900 Euros. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
